contentList.content: Bolster your allies against the dangers that lie ahead.

Hit point maximum increased by [1].

When you roll a 1 on an Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

You can see in the dark up to [2].
Swing your weapon in a large arc to attack up to [1] enemies at once.
Your carrying capacity is increased by [1]%.
Made of soft, sheepskin-lined leather, these are the perfect boots to wear around the campfire on a chilly night.
Contains a selection of camp clothing.
Contains a selection of camp shoes.
Drinking this elixir grants you +2 on all of your ability scores.
Drinking this elixir grants you +4 on all of your ability scores.
Drinking this elixir grants you +6 on all of your ability scores.
Drinking this elixir grants you +8 on all of your ability scores.
Drinking this elixir grants you +10 on all of your ability scores.

Drinking this elixir grants the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_ActionSurge">Action Surge</LSTag> ability. Additionally, you gain the <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack">Extra Attack</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="FastHands">Fast Hands</LSTag> passives.

Drinking this elixir grants you <LSTag Type="Tooltip" Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in all <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> Skills, and <LSTag Type="Tooltip" Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency</LSTag> in Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Drinking this elixir grants the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="CampClothes_Bolster">Bolster</LSTag> spell.
Drinking this elixir grants <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Fly">Fly</LSTag>.
Temporarily gain a significant boost to your strength, health, armor class, attack rolls, damage rolls, and saving throws.
Drinking this elixir grants the <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="CampClothes_PackMule_400">Pack Mule</LSTag> passive.
Drinking this elixir grants you <LSTag Type="Tooltip" Tooltip="Expertise">Expertise</LSTag> in all <LSTag Tooltip="Charisma">Charisma</LSTag> Skills, and the ability to play Musical Instruments.

Drinking this elixir grants you the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="CampClothes_RitualDisguiseSelf">Disguise Self</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="CampClothes_RitualEnhanceLeap">Enhance Leap</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="CampClothes_RitualDetectThoughts">Detect Thoughts</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="CampClothes_RitualSpeakWithDead">Speak with Dead</LSTag> ritual spells.
A magical barrier protects you from harm, making you resistant to all forms of damage. Incoming damage is reduced by [1].

Drinking this elixir grants the <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="CampClothes_Warding">Warding</LSTag> passive, and <LSTag Type="Tooltip" Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency</LSTag> in Constitution <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
Strike out with an adder's speed, the very exemplar of swiftness embodied in steel.

Gain +1 to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack</LSTag>, Damage, and <LSTag Tooltip="SpellDifficultyClass">Spell Save DC</LSTag> rolls. This increases to +2 at <LSTag>Level 5</LSTag>, and +3 at <LSTag>Level 9</LSTag>.
At <LSTag>Level 13</LSTag>, you reduce the number you need to roll a Critical Hit while attacking by 1. This is further reduced by 1 at <LSTag>Level 17</LSTag>.
